Experience.title: Java Backend Intern
Experience.description:
(Java, MySQL, SpringBoot, Mybaits)
Expand the customer service management systems, analysis the usage of the product, reducing manual workload for Service data technicians and operators.
Expand the clock recording section in the field of absence service to get the statistics of the clock record with the different scopes.
Developed a health check platform in the field of on-boarding service to filter the wrong data in the database.
